classes.label: Card draw & vision
classes.description: Adds cards to hand or manipulates the top of the deck (rules 409-410, 743).

classes.label: Discard / hand pressure
classes.description: Forces a player to discard or lose access to cards (rules 346, 407).

classes.label: Resource generation
classes.description: Generates energy, power, or rune advantage (rules 161-170).

classes.label: Movement / repositioning
classes.description: Moves cards between locations or battlefields (rules 430, 737).

classes.label: Recycle / shuffle
classes.description: Recycles or returns cards to decks (rules 403, 409).

classes.label: Search / tutor
classes.description: Searches decks or looks for cards (rules 346, 409).

classes.label: Priority & reaction modifiers
classes.description: Changes timing, reactions, or priority windows (rules 117, 346, 739).

classes.label: Mulligan / setup modifiers
classes.description: Changes opening hand or mulligan rules (rule 117).

classes.label: Generic effect
classes.description: Covers bespoke text without a detectable automation pattern.
